group_1.textLeft: ...It's completely deserted.

group_1.textRight: I-it's a little creepy up close...
We're quite a ways from the beach.

group_1.textLeft: Hey... why don't we turn back?

group_1.textRight: Whatever for?

group_1.textLeft: I didn't mind coming out here at first since@we were just taking a look,
But now, being here in my swimsuit makes@me feel... a little uneasy...

group_1.textRight: ...You're right.
There's no sign of anyone else here, but it's@prudent that we don't dawdle.

group_1.textLeft: We might use this place for our movie, though...@Let's take a quick look around before we go back.

group_1.textRight: I guess we can do that.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:120901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]―?!

group_1.textRight: I-I just heard something in the grass...!

group_1.textLeft: C-c-could it be that ghost?!

group_1.textRight: Calm down, both of you... Ghosts don't seem@like they'd come out during the day.

group_1.textLeft: No, I'm pretty sure it's coming out!
If a ghost hates your guts, it isn't gonna give a@crap if it's day or night!

group_1.textRight: But we haven't even entered the lighthouse yet―

group_1.textCenter: The hell is this? A buncha girls?

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:0.8][chara:120901:lipSynch_1]What?
A'ight, just put all the money ya got right here.

group_1.textRight: What's with the sudden... what are you guys@even talking about?

group_1.textLeft: You're here to test your courage, right?
You gotta pay what we like to call a little tourism@fee if you wanna get outta here.

group_1.textRight: ...Are you the keepers of the lighthouse?

group_1.textLeft: Nah, we’re just doing a bit of community service...
And teaching people a lesson in not sticking their@noses in places they don't belong.
Yeah, we’re the ones who made up all that crap@about the lighthouse and the ghost.
You goddamn morons.

group_1.textRight: ...Mugging people is so immature.

group_1.textLeft: You're one to talk!
Don't act tough, girlie! Give us the money!
[chara:800400:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]―?!

group_1.textCenter: The only one ACTING tough here is you.
There's no forgiving such a despicable ploy!

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashWhite1][bgEffect:shakeSmall]Gah!

group_1.textRight: Hikaru, you looked so cool! What an elegant foot@sweep!

group_1.textLeft: Heh, that's nothing for me!
This kid is surprisingly strong...!

group_1.textRight: Wh-what should we...?

group_1.textLeft: I don't care if that ghost is fake or not.@We're going in.

group_1.textRight: Yeah!

group_1.textLeft: Grr... Stop them!

group_1.textRight: What? You want some more?
H-hold up! The hell are you thinking?!

group_1.textLeft: I ain't gonna let some little brat trash me like this!

group_1.textRight: What's your plan, then?!

group_1.textLeft: ...The lighthouse.

group_1.textRight: Eh?
Stop whispering and just say what you want@to say.

group_1.textLeft: ...Ya said ya wanted to use this lighthouse for@yer movie, yeah?

group_1.textRight: What about it?

group_1.textLeft: If ya wanna use the lighthouse... yer gonna@have to get through all of us, first.
...Fine, then! Bring it on!

group_1.textRight: Whaaaaaat?! R-Rena?!

group_1.textLeft: Look, if we just leave these guys here,
They're guaranteed to sabotage our movie when@we come back to make it.
Instead, we'll kick their asses and make them@promise to scram and never mug people again.

group_1.textRight: Oh, I see!

group_1.textLeft: And, hey, fighting off delinquents is part and@parcel of a teen movie!

group_1.textRight: That's one way to look at it.

group_1.textLeft: So... we’re changing our movie's direction@AGAIN?

group_1.textRight: ...Let's take this someplace else.

group_1.textLeft: The hell is this about a movie…? Let's beat 'em@and get this over with.
